name: -webkit-mask
description: Defines a variety of mask properties within one declaration.
longDescription: As with most composite properties, all arguments are optional.

<attachment>.description: Defines the scrolling or fixed nature of the image mask. See -webkit-mask-attachment.

<clip>.description: Specifies whether the mask should extend into the border of a box. See -webkit-mask-clip.

<origin>.description: Determines where the -webkit-mask-position property is anchored. See -webkit-mask-origin.

<image>.description: Defines an image to be used as a mask for an element. See -webkit-mask-image.

<repeat>.description: Defines the repeating qualities of a mask. See -webkit-mask-repeat.

<composite>.description: Sets a compositing style for a mask. See -webkit-mask-composite.
